channel.title: Toolsday
channel.description: Toolsday is a 20-minute podcast about the latest in tech tools, tips, and tricks on Tuesdays at 2! (Our alliteration game is so strong). The podast is brought to you by Chris Dhanaraj and Una Kravets, and recorded live on IBM radio. After the show, we collect resources and post our episodes here.
channel.copyright: Copyright Â© Una Kravets and Chris Dhanaraj 2015
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hosted by Una Kravets and Chris Dhanaraj
channel.itunes:summary: 20 minutes of tech tool talk on Tuesdays at 2.
channel.itunes:keywords: toolsday, technolody, tech tools, frontend, web, development, web performance
channel.itunes:author: Toolsday

item.title: RxJS
item.description: This week we talk about getting started with RxJS and its data streaming possibilities with David Khourshid!
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about getting started with RxJS and its data streaming possibilities with David Khourshid! See show notes link for resources.

item.itunes:author: Una Kravets and Chris Dhanaraj

item.title: CSS Variables
item.description: CSS variables are so freaking useful and their fast adoption has us more than excited. In this short episode, we discuss implementation and some use cases.
